name: Automatiser les réponses FAQ avec le bot de détection de mots-clés WhatsApp
description:
- Comment ça fonctionne :
Ce bot fonctionne dans une boucle de surveillance continue de WhatsApp. Il analyse les messages pour détecter des mots-clés dans des questions courantes (comme les heures, les prix et l'emplacement) et envoie des réponses automatiques avec des informations prédéfinies. Pour les questions non reconnues, il dirige l'utilisateur vers une assistance manuelle.

- Étapes de configuration :
La configuration initiale implique l'intégration avec l'API WhatsApp, l'enregistrement des mots-clés et de leurs réponses respectives, et la définition du flux de secours. Il ne faut que quelques minutes pour que le bot fonctionne avec les informations essentielles.

parameters.textBody:
📝 I can only process text messages at the moment.

Please send your question as a text message, and I'll be happy to help! 😊

Type 'hello' to see what I can help you with.

parameters.content:
# 📱 WhatsApp Customer Support Bot

## What This Workflow Does
Automated WhatsApp chatbot that provides instant customer support by responding to common questions with pre-defined answers based on keyword detection.

## How It Works
1. **WhatsApp Listener**: Receives incoming messages 24/7
2. **Message Filtering**: Processes only text messages
3. **Keyword Detection**: Analyzes message content for FAQ topics
4. **Smart Responses**: Sends appropriate pre-written responses
5. **Fallback Handling**: Provides helpful guidance for unknown queries

## Supported Topics
🕐 **Business Hours** - Hours, open/close times
💰 **Pricing** - Packages, costs, fees
📍 **Location** - Address, directions, office info
📞 **Contact** - Phone, email, support details
👋 **Greetings** - Welcome message with menu

## Smart Features
✅ Case-insensitive keyword matching
✅ Natural language understanding
✅ Professional formatted responses
✅ Menu-driven navigation
✅ Graceful fallback for unknown queries

## Setup Required
1. WhatsApp Business API account
2. Phone Number ID from Meta
3. Configure webhook URLs
4. Customize responses for your business
5. Activate workflow

## Perfect For
• Small businesses needing 24/7 support
• FAQ automation
• Reducing support team workload
• Instant customer responses

**Handles 80% of common customer questions automatically.**

## Step 1: Message Reception

**WhatsApp Trigger** receives all incoming messages from customers 24/7

**Setup**: Requires WhatsApp Business API
**Webhook**: Automatically configured

*Listens constantly for customer messages*

## Step 2: Message Type Filter

**IF Node** ensures we only process text messages

✅ **Text Messages**: Continue to processing
❌ **Other Types**: Send friendly error message

*Keeps bot focused and reliable*

## Step 3: Data Extraction

**Set Node** extracts and cleans message data:
• Message text (lowercase, trimmed)
• Sender phone number
• Message ID

*Prepares data for keyword matching*

## Step 4: Keyword Detection

**Switch Node** analyzes message content:
• Multiple keywords per category
• Case-insensitive matching
• Natural language friendly
• Fallback for unknown queries

*Intelligent message routing*

## Step 5: Response Generation

**Set Nodes** create professional responses:
• Business hours with real-time status
• Detailed pricing information
• Complete location details
• Contact information
• Welcome menu for navigation
• Helpful fallback messages

*Consistent, professional communication*

## Step 6: Message Delivery

**WhatsApp Node** sends formatted response back to customer

• Instant delivery
• Professional formatting
• Emoji enhancement

*Complete the customer service loop*

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
